column1:
bitsyww2,"2016-02-26T18:13:32.363Z","Excellent adventure!","

I bought this one after acquiring and building 60036.
column3: s fantastic and was much bigger than I expected. &nbsp

column1: Box/Instructions: Normal everything was broken up nicely.
column2: Easy enough for young builders but not so simple as to insult AFOL&#39
s of ice cubes, the ships hull is nice and sleek and fairly long. &nbsp

column1: Minifigures:Pretty much the same as in 60036 with the addition of the ships Captain.
column3: s nice to see a female mini fig included. &nbsp

column1: The build: The little mini builds are fun and add a lot of ambience to the whole set.
column2: The sled was a little different from the one in 60036 as were the helicopter and snow mobile which ads nice variety to the line and increases interest if you&#39

column1: The completed model: The final product is really impressive.
column2: The way the accessory and mini build pieces fit on the ship with out looking tacked on is pretty slick. &nbsp
column5: All the varied elements give it a high level of playability and really make this a great value in my opinion. &nbsp

column1: Overall opinion: I would recommend this to set to anyone.
column2: I really felt there was a lot of brick for the buck. My tween step child loved it as much as I did and spent a lot of time rebuilding and playing with it
